<style>
  :root{
    --brand:#634360; --brand-100:#f0ddef; --text:#0f172a;
    --radius:16px; --shadow:0 12px 28px rgba(0,0,0,.10);
  }

  .contact-hero{
    border-radius: 24px;
    background:
      radial-gradient(900px 420px at 85% -10%, var(--brand-100), transparent 60%),
      linear-gradient(180deg,#ffffff,#faf7fb 70%,#ffffff);
    padding: clamp(24px,5vw,56px);
    margin: 8px 0 24px;
    box-shadow: var(--shadow);
  }
  .contact-hero h1{ margin:0 0 .25rem 0; font-weight:700; letter-spacing:.2px; }
  .contact-hero p{ margin:0; color:#4b5563; max-width:70ch; }

  .contact-grid{
    display:grid; gap:20px;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(280px, 1fr));
    margin: 1rem 0 2rem;
  }
  .card{
    background:#fff; border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.06);
    border-radius: var(--radius); padding:20px; box-shadow: var(--shadow);
  }
  .card h3{ margin-top:0; font-size:1.05rem; }
  .row{ display:flex; flex-direction:column; gap:8px; }
  .pill{
    display:inline-flex; align-items:center; gap:10px;
    border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.08); padding:10px 12px; border-radius:999px;
    text-decoration:none; color:var(--text); background:#fff;
    transition: transform .15s ease, box-shadow .15s ease, border-color .15s ease;
  }
  .pill:hover{ transform: translateY(-2px); box-shadow:0 10px 18px rgba(0,0,0,.10); border-color: rgba(0,0,0,.15);}
  .pill strong{ letter-spacing:.2px; }
  .accent{ color: var(--brand); }

  /* form */
  .form{ display:grid; gap:10px; }
  .form input, .form textarea{
    width:100%; border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.12); border-radius:12px;
    padding:12px 14px; font:inherit; outline:none; background:#fff;
  }
  .form textarea{ min-height:120px; resize:vertical; }
  .btn{
    display:inline-block; border:none; border-radius:999px;
    padding:12px 18px; background:var(--brand); color:#fff; font-weight:600; cursor:pointer;
    box-shadow:0 10px 20px rgba(99,67,96,.25);
  }
  .btn:hover{ filter:brightness(0.97); }

  /* map */
  .map-wrap{ border-radius: 16px; overflow:hidden; box-shadow: var(--shadow); }
  .map{ width:100%; aspect-ratio: 16 / 9; border:0; }

  /* dark mode */
  .quarto-dark .card, .quarto-dark .contact-hero{ background:#14161a; border-color:rgba(255,255,255,.06); color:#e7e8ea; }
  .quarto-dark .contact-hero p{ color:#c9c9c9; }
  .quarto-dark .pill{ background:#0f1115; color:#e7e8ea; border-color:rgba(255,255,255,.08); }
  .quarto-dark .form input, .quarto-dark .form textarea{ background:#0f1115; color:#e7e8ea; border-color:rgba(255,255,255,.08); }
  .quarto-dark .map-wrap{ box-shadow:none; }
</style>

<script>
  // simple mailto composer with a hidden anchor for better cross-browser behavior
  document.getElementById('contact-form').addEventListener('submit', function(e){
    e.preventDefault();

    const nameRaw = document.getElementById('name').value.trim();
    const emailRaw = document.getElementById('email').value.trim();
    const msgRaw = document.getElementById('message').value.trim();

    if(!nameRaw || !emailRaw || !msgRaw) return; // guard

    const subject = `New enquiry from ${nameRaw} (${emailRaw})`;
    const body =
`Name: ${nameRaw}
Email: ${emailRaw}

Message:
${msgRaw}`;

    const mailto = `mailto:info@statoberry.com?cc=statistician@statoberry.com&subject=${encodeURIComponent(subject)}&body=${encodeURIComponent(body)}`;

    const link = document.getElementById('mailto-link');
    link.setAttribute('href', mailto);

    // some browsers handle window.location on mailto inconsistently; clicking an <a> is more reliable
    link.click();
  });
</script>
